job.title: Data Systems Engineer
job.industry: Defense & Space,Information Technology and Services,Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing
job.description:
The Naval Nuclear Laboratory is seeking a highly motivated Data Systems Engineer to support transitioning testing to an agile and modern approach with focus on supporting multiple platforms (e.g. bench top experiments, medium sized portable test stands, large scale mockups)! New testing needs will require the development of various data acquisition systems (DAS) solutions utilizing commercial and custom designs to fit the scale of testing.
The DSE unit is responsible for developing and maintaining DAS to provide high quality and timely test data to the Knolls Atomic Power Laboratory (KAPL) testing community.
Responsibilities of this position include, but are not limited to:
If you are interested in being part of a team that does challenging yet rewarding work from concept to completion, apply today!
